video.title: Yo-Kai Watch
video.synopsis: Nate frees a mythical being trapped in a magic capsule, and the two new friends have adventures with all sorts of troublesome supernatural creatures.

episodes.synopsis: A Yo-kai named Whisper appears when Nate finds a mysterious machine in the forest, opening his eyes to a new world, including cheeky cat Jibanyan.
episodes.title: Yo-kai are Real / The Spooky Intersection

episodes.synopsis: Nate investigates a mysterious creature in the local river. Katie tells an embarrassing story to the entire school, thanks to Yo-kai Tattletell!
episodes.title: The One in the Water / Why Did You Say That? / Katie's Secret

episodes.synopsis: Katie encounters Manjimutt, who gives her quite a scare. Nate discovers that this human-faced dog has a sad past. Roughraff inspirits Eddie.
episodes.title: The Rare One / Yo-kai Manjimutt / Here Comes Roughraff / Manjimutt: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Everyone in Nate's class, including the teacher, forgets things at home. Yo-kai Hungramps meets Nate outside a store. Majimutt looks for a new career.
episodes.title: Yo-kai Medallium / Yo-kai Hungramps / Yo-kai Wazzat / Manjimutt: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is dumbfounded when Eddie and Bear receive chocolates on Valentine's Day! A visit from a paranormal investigator has Nate worried.
episodes.title: Manjimutt: Part 4 / Yo-kai Illoo / Let's Exorcise!

episodes.synopsis: Nate is oddly eager to take on cleaning duties when no one else will. Signibble interferes at asleepover. Manjimutt may have found his dream job!
episodes.title: Manjimutt: Part 5 / Yo-kai Blazion / Yo-kai Negatibuzz / The Sleepover

episodes.synopsis: Nate meets a country Yo-kai on his first visit to the city. Nosirs interferes with Nate's class during a test. Manjimutt tries pottery.
episodes.title: Manjimutt: Part 6 / Here's Komasan! / Yo-kai Nosirs

episodes.synopsis: Nate hurries to the school toilet and finds an unusually long line. Jibanyan is inspirited by Hidabat. Manjimutt dreams the biggest dream of all!
episodes.title: Manjimutt: Part 7 / Yo-kai Fidgephant / Yo-kai Hidabat

episodes.synopsis: Nate and friends start a treasure hunt. A mysterious visitor turns out to be a robot cat Yo-kai from the future. Komasan's brother arrives.
episodes.title: Here's Komajiro! / Yo-kai Cadin / Robonyan Activate!

episodes.synopsis: Yo-kai Buhu brings a run of awful luck. Nate's Yo-kai Medallium opens a gateway to the legendary Shogunyan. Komasan tries to help his little brother.
episodes.title: Komasan & Komajiro: In the City / Yo-kai Buhu / The Legend of Shogunyan

episodes.synopsis: Nate, Eddie and Bear are on a quest to buy the latest video game, but Yo-kai Spenp interferes. Komasan and Komajiro face a huge challenge.
episodes.title: Komasan & Komajiro: The Turnstile / Yo-kai Spenp / Yo-kai Noway / Manjimutt: Catch & Release

episodes.synopsis: A farting noise is heard in class and Katie is embarrassed. This must be the work of Yo-kai Cheeksqueak! Komajiro shows off his tech skills.
episodes.title: Komasan & Komajiro: Ear Warmers / Yo-kai Cheeksqueak / Manjimutt: The Great Dog Escape Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Bear makes some stunning boasts and Nate's awful dancing skills get a boost. Sounds like Yo-kai! Manjimutt finds an ally. The brothers try fast food.
episodes.title: Komasan & Komajiro: Low Budget Vittles / Yo-kai Chatalie / The Yo-kai Dancers / Manjimutt: The Great Dog Escape Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Komasan takes Komajiro on a city tour and shows him Sakura tower. Nate's mom gets outlandish fashion ideas from a Yo-kai. Manjimutt's team grows.
episodes.title: Komasan & Komajiro: The Magic Floor / Yo-kai Dazzabel & Yo-kai Dimmy / Manjimutt: The Great Dog Escape Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Nate and friends visit a local spa but become too dizzy from the heat. It's Yo-kai tricks again! The brothers have a night on the town.
episodes.title: Komasan & Komajiro: DJKJ / Yo-kai Sproink / Yo-kai Babblong / Manjimutt: The Great Dog Escape Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Nate's family trip to a waterfall becomes more interesting once Yo-kai show up. Komajiro's new friends may not be friendly. Manjimutt learns a secret.
episodes.title: Spring Break Present / Yo-kai Peppillon / Komasan & Komajiro: My Cool Brother / Manjimutt: The Great Dog Escape Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Nate's dad bakes his wife some Mother's Day goodies, but somehow she ends up sulking. Komasan enters the workforce and Manjimutt awaits his release.
episodes.title: Komasan & Komajiro: The Country Bumpkin Episode 1 / Yo-kai Cynake / Yo-kai Rockabelly / Manjimutt: The Great Dog Escape Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Yo-kai Kyubi come to the human world searching for heart energy. Will his charming looks work on Katie? Komasan's rise at work may come crashing down.
episodes.title: Kyubi: Operation Heartbreak / Yo-kai Gargaros / Komasan & Komajiro: The Country Bumpkin Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Nate oversleeps and hurriedly runs to school, but finds everyone dozing off. Kyubi tries again to win over Katie. Komasan helps the company president.
episodes.title: Komasan & Komajiro: The Country Bumpkin Episode 3 / Yo-kai Baku / Kyubi: Operation Amusement Park

episodes.synopsis: As Nate and Whisper talk, the Yo-kai Medallium starts to glimmer, summoning the legendary Dandoodle. The toy company president picks a successor.
episodes.title: The Legend of Dandoodle / Komasan & Komajiro: The Country Bumpkin Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Nate's classmates leave their work half-finished and everyone is battling sleeplessness, thanks to Yo-kai D'wanna and Insomni. Komasan falls in love.
episodes.title: Yo-kai D'wanna / Yo-kai Insomni / Komasan: Love, Poetry and Coffee 1

episodes.synopsis: Unable to keep up with his friends in a popular game, Nate tries to skip classes so he can practice alone. Is Komasan's crush in danger?
episodes.title: Komasan: Love, Poetry and Coffee 2 / Yo-kai Duchoo / Yo-kai Ake & Payn

episodes.synopsis: Nate's mother makes a big dinner, only to start nibbling on the food non-stop! It must be a Yo-kai. Komasan is determined to protect his crush.
episodes.title: Komasan: Love, Poetry and Coffee 3 / Yo-kai Grubsnitch / Yo-kai B3-NK1

episodes.synopsis: A fun trip to the woods takes a turn when an eerie breeze casts a gloomy shadow over Nate and friends. Whisper is starstruck. Komasan dons a disguise.
episodes.title: Komasan: Love, Poetry and Coffee 4 / Yo-kai Tengloom / The Real One

episodes.synopsis: After Jibanyan has a fight with Nate and runs away from home, he gets the chance to relive an important day from his past.
episodes.title: Jibanyan's Secret

episodes.synopsis: Katie suddenly shows psychic powers! Peckpocket brings his thieving ways to Nate's school. Will Komasan reveal his true nature?
episodes.title: Yo-kai Espy / Yo-kai Peckpocket / Komasan: Love, Poetry and Coffee 5
